questions.question: Decision making exists because there is a need to choose among options.
Identify which of the followings is not the example of limiting factor.
Choose the correct characteristic of Programmed Decision Making

choices.answer: No clear rules in making decision

questions.question: Choose example for Non-Programmed Decision Making

choices.answer: Set up new branch of business
Bank charge interest for late payment

questions.question: Identify the correct action for effective decision making.

choices.answer: The organisation identifies its own limitations.
The organisation standardise its products across all countries.
The organisation continues to invest as long as the economy is good.
The organisation simplifies the decision making process for prompt action.
